entry.data:
CLOUDY WITH A SLIGHT CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS LATE THIS EVENING, THEN SHOWERS LIKELY AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S
EAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

SHOWERS LIKELY WITH A SLIGHT CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS IN THE MORNING, THEN SHOWERS LIKELY WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 60S
NORTHEAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS IN THE EVENING
MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 50S
NORTHEAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF PRECIPITATION 30 PERCENT

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 60S
NORTHEAST WINDS AROUND 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE UPPER 40S
NORTHEAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S
LOWS IN THE LOWER 50S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE MORNING, THEN PARTLY SUNNY WITH SHOWERS LIKELY WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE MID 70S
CHANCE OF RAIN 60 PERCENT

MOSTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 60S
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S
